newsitem.title: USA: PHLX to list MoneyGram, Visio options.
newsitem.headline: PHLX to list MoneyGram, Visio options.

text.p: The Philadelphia Stock Exchange (PHLX) said Thursday it would list options on shares of MoneyGram Payment Systems Inc and Visio Corp on April 8.
The exchange said MoneyGram options would have opening strike prices of 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2, with position limits of 7,500 contracts. Initial expirations are set for May, June, July and October.
Visio options would open with strikes of 35, 40 and 45 and initial expirations in May, June, September and December. Position limits of 4,500 contracts have been set.
The exchange said TFM Investment Group has been named the specialist unit for both options.
